text: Dasari Narayana Rao (4 May 1942â€“ 30 May 2017) was an Indian movie director, screenwriter, actor, politician, and lyricist. He was known for his works in Telugu cinema, and few Bollywood movies. He has directed more than one hundred and fifty feature movies of many genres. His works are known to be part of social injustice, corruption and gender discrimination. Rao has received two National Film Awards, nine state Nandi Awards including the Raghupathi Venkaiah Award, and four Filmfare Awards South including the lifetime Achievement. During his career he has also acted in Telugu, Tamil, and Kannada languages. ==References== ==Other websites== *Official Website * Category:1942 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Indian movie directors Category:Indian movie actors Category:Politicians from Andhra Pradesh Category:Indian screenwriters Category:Indian songwriters
title: Dasari Narayana Rao
